inn1.comm: false start, misdirected bouncer outside leg stump, Strauss gets away and the umpire frees his arms
good length on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg to get off the mark
fuller on the off and a hint of movement into the left hander, defended into the leg side
short and wide, Strauss misses out, would have liked to cut it in front of point, gets a thick outside edge that flies towards third man
on middle and off, defended off the back foot to cover
short of a good length on the off stump, punched straight to cover
mauled it, width and he cashes in, cuts it away fiercely wide of point, raced to the boundary
what a tame dismissal, after the superb tour he's had! Banged in short on the off stump, goes for the pull, mistimes it completely and it lobs up straight to Bravo at midwicket
testing line outside off, just a fraction short, holds its line, left alone
the inswinger, fullish on the off stump, dug out towards cover
back of a length on the off stump, turned away into the leg side
short of a good length on the off, Pietersen stands tall and drops it short of cover
fullish on the off stump, plays inside the line to that one, gets a thick edge wide of point as he goes for a drive, gets a couple as third man takes sometime running in to cut that off
short and wide, goes for the upper cut, misses
slightly short of a good length on the off stump, tries to force it off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge towards third man

the pull's not going right for the England batsmen, banged in short on middle and he tried to roll his wrists over it to play it wide of square leg, hit the bottom of the bat there and dropped dead on the leg side
short outside off, cuts hard but straight to point
excellent shot, just a fraction overpitched on the off stump and he takes full advantage, driving it on the up between cover and mid-off
off the back foot this time, back of a length but the line is the same, he stands tall and punches it through the same gap, easily done
short of a length on the off stump, blocked towards point
back of a length and moving away, reaches for a cut, misses, but it's called a wide
full outside off, goes for a blazing drive through the covers, misses, was in the slot but he was a little early into that shot
short of a length outside off, cut away behind point for a single to third man
stylishly done but all for a run, short on middle and leg, shuffles and flicks it down to fine leg
fired in on middle, defended off the front foot towards midwicket
fullish on the off stump, mistimes a drive to cover, decent start, Pietersen has looked good
short of a length outside off, a loosener that, kept a little low, dropped between point and cover for a quick single
took forever to reach the bat, a slower one, dabbed down to third man
good length on the off, reaches forward and defends it watchfully to cover
a touch too straight, Pietersen gets his left foot across and turns it away wide of deep square leg for a couple
gets worse, straying down the leg side, tries to whip it away fine but it's a wide
missed out there, full on the pads, should have been dismissed to the deep midwicket boundary, is rapped on the pads and Bravo can breathe easy
nicely done, slightly short this time, pushed in front of deep midwicket, there's a yawning gap there and they have plenty of time to get back for the second
short of a good length on the off, defended to cover
smashed through point, he's been waiting for that, short and wide and gets the treatment
pushed off the back foot wide of point and scampers for a quick run, there's a shy at the non-striker's end from Bravo but Bopara is well in
Pietersen goes for the cut this time and misses, in the slot but he's a little late on it
full on the off, drives through the line to mid-off and sets off, there's an attempt to run him out at the non-striker's end and it would have been close had that hit, was reaching full stretch there
good length on the off stump, pushed to mid-off from the crease

appeal for a run out, pushed back to the bowler taking a couple of steps forward, Bravo is quick to spot him out of the crease and rockets back an accurate throw, Pietersen slides his bat just back in time
struck firmly but straight to cover, had moved across even before the ball was delivered, landed on a good length outside off, pushes it to short cover
tempting line outside the off stump, gets forward and tries to launch that one over cover, ends up slicing it in the direction of deep point
a straight one, Bopara whips it into the leg side for an easy run
a risky run that, pushed off the front foot just wide of midwicket, appears to be struggling to make it back but replays indicate he was well in even if that had hit
short of a length on the off, punched wide of mid-on for a quick single
short of a length outside off, in the cutting zone and Bopara fails to get his bat to it
held it back again, restrains himself and defends it into the off side
a touch fuller on the off stump, defended to mid-off
punched off the back foot towards deep cover, pushes him back with a slightly short one there
slower ball gone bad, lands in the slot outside off, Pietsersen picks it, frees his arms and dispatches it over the bowler's head for a flat six
full on the off stump, pushed towards point
back of a length this time, blocked into the off side again
perhaps the first signs of frustration, good length on the off stump and he tries to cross-bat that wide of mid-on even though the shot wasn't on, gets his bat to it, and a single for the effort
short of a length on middle, goes for a mighty pull over midwicket, is struck high on the thigh
short and wide, slashes hard and it pays off, flies off the outside edge just wide of the diving Ramdin to the third-man boundary
similar length but much closer to the off stump, tries to run it down to third man, misses
slower one bowled short on the off stump, dropped short of cover for a quick single
on middle and leg, the fielders inside the circle are perhaps standing a little too deep, dabbed short of midwicket for a single

lucky but he'll take it, short of a good length outside off, tries to force it off the back foot through the covers, gets an inside edge that just manages to evade the off stump and the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
angling in towards leg stump, worked away wide of midwicket
short of a length outside off, guided to third man
struck powerfully but there's cover in the deep, full and wide but with a spread out field, a single is all he can manage
short of a good length on the off stump, struck towards deep cover
military medium really but maintaining a good line, slightly short on middle and off, pushed into the leg side
short outside off and keeps really low, Bopara is already into the pull and the ball zips under his bat
goodish length on the off, eased through the covers for a single
back of a length on middle and off, pushed wide of midwicket
short outside off, bounced more than the batsman expected, he was attempting to dab it to third man but the ball spat off the pitch to escape the outside edge
starts off bowling short on the off stump, punched straight to Gayle at cover
tossed up on middle and off, gets forward and defends
quicker one bowled short on middle, whipped away towards deep square leg
flighted, lands on a good length on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine
much slower through the air, on middle and off, tries to cut, ends up chopping it down towards cover
full on middle and off, driven down the ground to long-on to keep the strike
bowling it short outside off, run down to third man
a mindless slog over midwicket, well he didn't connect, was too wide and he tries to drag it into the leg side, was nowhere near it
Pollard misses a run out, pushed towards him at point and though he was quick to get to the ball, his throw was off the mark at the non-striker's end, Bopara was gone had that hit
stump-to-stump there, tucked away in front of square for a single
short and much closer to the off stump, he's been trying that shot for a while now and it finally pays off, waits for it, gets back and pulls it away over the deep square-leg boundary
Benn erring in length this time, short and wide, makes room and cuts it away in the vacant point region. Bravo dives to his left to pull it back in and despite the valiant attempt, fails
fullish on middle, walks across and drives it wide of long-on for a couple
pushed off the back foot wide of cover
dabbed into the leg side towards midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, pushed in the direction of point on the front foot
slightly short on the off stump, pushed towards cover and sets off for a quick single, colliding with Benn on reaching the non-striker's end, no hard feelings though there was no apology exchanged
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler who hands his leg out to stop that one
short and wide, goes for the cut, misses for the umpteenth time
had shaped himself for a paddle down towards fine leg, it's too short and he instead swats it in the direction of deep midwicket
kept really low and didn;t miss the off stump by much there, Bopara was late into that shot and couldn't get his bat down in time
and spits off the pitch this time, not the easiest of pitches this, lands short outside off and the batsman tries to help it on its way to third man but is beaten by the bounce
good stuff, full on middle and off this time, played down the ground to long-on, mixed it up nicely that over
full on middle and leg, driven down to the ground to long-on

gone! Some good bounce there for Benn, short outside off and Pietersen tries to cut that off the back foot, does so but uppishly and straight to Sammy at point does a good job diving forward to his left to hold on to that one
tossed up outside off, tries to slap that through the off side, misses
quicker one angling down leg, tries to drive it wide of midwicket, is rapped on the pads
fullish on middle and leg, defended into the leg side
slower one landed on a good length on the off stump, surprises Shah who is already into the drive, lobs up towards mid-off but falls just short
good length on middle and off, turned to midwicket
worked away into the leg side behind square for a single
short on middle and gets the treatment, pulls it away over deep square leg for a mighty six
good length on the off, driven on the up wide of long-off for a couple
on middle and off, pushed straight to cover
fired in down the leg side, tries to flick it away fine, is hit on the pads
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
thrown up outside off, makes room and chips it wide of deep cover for a couple
low full toss on leg stump, turned away straight to short fine
fullish on middle and leg, comes down the track and digs it out towards long-on

the shot just wasn't on, bowled on a good length outside off and he tried to heave that over midwicket from the crease, got the top edge and Ramdin just had to take a couple of steps to his left to complete an easy catch
gets a short one outside off and he chops it down to deep point
just a fraction wide of the off stump, opens the face and guides it wide of the keeper for a single
similar delivery, identical result, run down to third man but bowled a much closer to the off stump there
on and outside off, in that channel, pushed straight to cover
slightly fuller, driven through the line to mid-off
tossed up on middle, makes room and defends it with a closed face

a cheap dismissal, and West Indies have pulled things back well here. Full on middle and off, really slow through the air, tries to clear long-on but with little intent, was a gentle loft that, wasn't struck cleanly and Simmons, waiting in the deep just for such an error, takes it comfortably
short of a length outside off, cut away straight to point
back of a length on the off, punched down the ground to long-off
short on the off stump, gets back and bunts it to long-on
full on leg stump, flicked away towards fine leg for a single
fullish outside off, steered to third man for a single
on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
angling down leg this time, worked away behind square for a single
back of a length on the off stump, defended from the crease short of point
stunning catch! Bowled short on middle and leg and Flintoff just chips it towards midwicket where Chanderpaul dives full length to his right to pluck that inches from the ground, superbly done
full on the off stump, dug out towards mid-off
short of a length outside off, swatted down the ground to long-off

almost bowled him there, tried to turn it away behind square, was struck on the pads and then on the glove, the ball appeared to  be rolling back onto the stumps but Prior did well to block it in time
flighted on middle, pushed to cover
driven towards midwicket, the non-striker calls for a single but is sent back, wisely
flighted on middle and off, defends it with a lunge
and again, thrown up on the off stump, Prior plays a textbook defense but at the wrong time in the match
short of a good length outside off, cut away between deep point and deep cover for a couple
fuller on the off stump, driven straight to mid-off, West Indies have given little away since that second-wicket pair was separated
good length on the off stump, defends with a full face to mid-off
slightly short on the off stump, tries to cut it behind point but mistimes it, another dot ball
similar ball but does well to give himself room and guide that to third man
things have gone quiet here, on the stumps and Prior dabs it to midwicket
flat on the off stump, pushed towards midwicket
flighted on the off stump, comes down the track and drives it to long-off
tossed up on middle, swept uppishly towards fine leg
straight on middle, pushed to midwicket
flat and quick on the off stump, played back to Gayle
flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
that was coming, a slog but connected well, just a fraction short outside off but he managed to heave it well over square leg for a one bounce four
full on the off stump, plays the across the line towards long-on
full on middle and leg, makes room but the bowler chases him, played back to Pollard
slower ball on middle, turned away behind square, good comeback after being struck for a boundary first ball
low full toss on middle, Collingwood sweeps it between deep square leg and deep midwicket, the latter manages to kick it back in but they've taken a couple
banged in short on middle and Collingwood makes full use, pulling it just wide of deep midwicket who leaps to pluck that out of thin air with one hand but isn't able to reach it, useful over that
full on leg stump, flicked towards square leg, there were more than three fielders outside the circle and therefore it's been given a no-ball
well bowled, yorker just wide of leg stump, Prior had made room there but didn;t get his bat down in time as the bowler chased him, was lucky to get away
targeting the off stump this time, dug out into the off side for a quick single
low full toss on the off stump, gets forward and pushes it towards long-off
well struck, full outside off and he square drives it wide of point, just opened the face at the last moment to beat the gap between point and cover
more runs, just slightly short on middle, makes room and slaps it over the bowler's head, didn't time that well enough but manages a couple
full on the off stump, fails to pierce the gap there, driven straight to cover
yorker length on leg stump, played through the line to long-on
overpitched again, makes room to deposit that into the stands over long-off, gets a single as he fails to get the desired elevation
good length on the off stump, eased through the covers for a single
short of a length, but a little too wide, given as Prior lets it go expecting that decision
well bowled, fired into the blockhole on middle, dug out back to the bowler
fullish on middle and off, chipped over extra cover for a couple
too wide, Prior gets back and smashes it over point for a boundary, brings up the 150 with just two more overs to go
tries to be a little inventive there, full outside off with the third-man up, tries to reverse paddle that wide of the keeper, misses
bowled full on middle and leg, pushed towards long-off for a single
gets his left leg out for an attempted slog but it's too full, so he adjusts and blocks it wide of midwicket
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, goes for a mighty heave over midwicket, gets the outside edge and Chanderpaul throws himself to his right at third man to pull it just back in
overpitched outside off stump, struck in the direction of deep cover
slower ball bowled slightly short on the off stump, patted wide of cover for a single
full outside leg stump, shuffles and paddles it to the fine-leg boundary, would have done Dougie Marillier proud
better, a low full toss on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
a well disguised slower one, reaches for it, converts it into a low full toss and plays it into the leg side
full on middle, length ball badly needed by England, gets his left foot out and smashes it between long-on and deep midwicket
full on middle and leg, attempts a similar shot but mistimes it to long-on, played just wide of the fielder and they manage to get back for the second

inn2.comm: in the channel outside off stump, left alone to the keeper
too wide there, landed on a good length outside off and moved further away
better, on the stumps this time, defended to point
Big blow! Full on the off stump and moving away from the left hander, Gayle gets forward to defend with an open face, gets the outside edge and Flintoff takes a dolly at second slip
short of a good length on the off stump, defended to point
short of a length, goes for the cut, ends up chopping it down to cover
back of a length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
bowling from wide of the crease, creating that angle into the right hander, defended off the back foot to the bowler
short and wide, good bounce, Sarwan goes for a monstrous cut through point, misses
short of a good length outside off, gets back and runs it down to third man
short on middle and leg, whipped away off his pads for a single to fine leg
short of a length on middle, turned to midwicket
good length on middle and leg, pushes him onto the back foot, worked away to square leg
fraction short on the off stump, chopped down wide of point and third man for a couple
back of a length outside off, not too wide, opens the face to guide it to third man
short of a length on the off, mistimes a cut straight to cover
banged in short again, stands tall, drops it wide of point for a quick single
beaten, neither too full nor too short, Simmons plays that from the crease trying to run it down behind point, misses

kept really low, short outside off, fails to get his bat down in time, gets a faint inside edge and Prior fails to collect it cleanly on the bounce, allowing it to go through him to the fine-leg boundary
short of a length on the off stump, punched towards a diving point off the back foot
on middle and off, pushed back towards the bowler who throws it back at the striker's end to leave Sarwan reaching for the crease
a touch too wide though Sarwan will feel he missed out, tried to slash it over point, but had made way too much room
full on the off stump, drives through the line to pierce the gap between mid-off and cover, beautifully timed
four more, banged in short on the off stump, waits for it and pulls it away over square leg, Broad under pressure
responds well, in the blockhole outside off, dug out to cover
angling into the right hander, fends it away behind square for a single
picked it up beautifully, straying on the leg stump, clips it off the pads over square leg, wristy shot that
sweetly struck but straight to cover, overpitched outside off, failed to cash in
backs away from the pull this time, a touch too high perhaps, banged in short outside off
bowled short on middle from wide of the crease, dropped into the off side short of point for an easy single
poor over this from Anderson, straying on the pads and Sammy has no trouble turning that away well wide of the short-fine fielder
good length on the off stump, drawing him forward, pushed off the front foot to cover
back of a length outside off, cut away towards point, a little too close to the off stump to execute that shot as well as he would have liked
is fortunate this time, played the right shot though, a fraction full and tried to drive that through the line, got an inside edge onto the pads and it rolled down just wide of leg stump
nice testing line outside off and moved away a shade, left alone
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed gently to cover
back of a length on the off stump, chopped down to point
cramped him for room there, on the off stump and angling in towards middle, defended to midwicket
short on middle and leg, whipped away to fine leg
well struck but straight to the fielder in the deep, didn;t really care too much about the length there, just came down the track and flicked it away to deep midwicket
back of a length on the off stump, blocked short of point and sets off for a quick single, shy at the stumps but Sarwan has made it easily
short of a length on the off stump, dabbed to third man for a single, stylishly done
short and wide, had shaped himself for a cut there but was out of his reach
jumped up to him but he he did a good job dropping it down towards Flintoff at a widish slip, played with soft hands
short again, makes room and slashes it towards third man for a single

in the slot outside off, takes his left foot out and lofts it over mid-on, clears him comfortably but Pietersen does well to haul it back in, keeps the batsmen to a couple though there should have been three
inside edge onto the pads, almost dragged it on, short on the off stump, tried to defend it in the direction of cover

gone! Too many attempts at a cut missed in this match and this one adds to the tally, short and wide, tries to clear point, gets a faint nick as Flintoff gains some good bounce and Prior pouches it comfortably
plays the pull immediately, short on middle, struck in front of square for a single
goes for the pull but is undone by some sharp bounce, is rapped on the gloves
short of a length outside off, leaps as he guides that to third man
bowled at 87.3 kmph on middle, slightly short, pulled away to fine leg
short on the off stump, tries to swat it back past the bowler, mistimes it
held it back, short outside off, chopped down to third man for a single
good bounce for the England fast bowlers here, Simmons deals with this one well, getting across and punching it wide of midwicket for a single
came back in after landing on a good length outside off, Chanderpaul gets back and defends it towards cover

full and wide, goes for a flowing drive through the covers, misses, the England fielders break out unanimously into a massive appeal but the sound was of the bat hitting the ground, the umpire gets it right
Simmons has thrown it away here, a fraction short on the off stump and he tries to slog it over mid-on, doesn't get hold of it, ends up mistiming it straight to Broad who accepts it gleefully
good length on middle and off, gets on the front foot and defends it into the leg side
short of a length on the off stump, guided to point
bowled at 89.1 mph, tries to run it past slip, misses
short on middle, mistimes a pull into the vacant leg-side field for a single
good length on middle and off, worked away wide of midwicket for a single
straying on the pads, a little too short, is struck on the thighs as he tries to whip it fine, gets a leg bye
attempted pull but gets the inside edge just wide of the leg stump
short of a length outside off, decent bounce, let through to the keeper
short on middle, gets back and turns it away to fine leg, brings up the 50
that'll cheer them up, short on the off stump, pulled away powerfully wide of a diving deep midwicket
a misdirected bounce down the leg side, too high as well, given a wide
slower ball bowled on a good length on middle, tickled to fine leg
short of a good length on the off, chopped behind point for a single
fullish on the off stump, defended solidly to cover
too straight, on middle and held its line, flicked away uppishly wide of deep square leg for a couple
good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot back to the bowler
back of a length on middle, pushed off the back foot to midwicket, the pressure slowly building on these two
ends a good over, maintaining a tight line on the off stump, defended off the front foot to midwicket
short one, chopped down to point
held it back again, on the off stump, played to midwicket
fuller on middle and leg, flicked to fine leg
short of a good length on middle, defended off the back foot to mid-on
driven through the line past the bowler towards long-on
short of a length on middle and off, gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps that towards deep midwicket
full outside off, driven straight to mid-off
short of a good length on the off stump, punched back to the bowler
sweetly timed, just a fraction short outside off, gets on the back foot and lofts it over the long-off boundary, shot of the day that,  wasn't much effort involved but cleared the ropes by a distance
on middle and off, closes the face to play it down to midwicket
good length on middle, gets forward and defends it into the leg side
full on leg stump, turned away to midwicket, good comeback after conceding that six

Probably a decisive wicket! England had built up the pressure nicely and Chanderpaul was forced into going for a slog-sweep over square leg, didn't time it well enough and Bell, the substitute fielder, stationed in the deep just has a few steps forward to complete a simple catch
full on middle and leg, driven through the midwicket region for a single to give the new man Pollard the strike
a goodish length on middle and leg, defended with a straight bat towards mid-on
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully towards cover
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
bowled short outside off, dragged into the leg side towards deep midwicket
short of a good length on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
similar short, kept a little low on leg stump, but he was nicely behind it, pushed it back past the bowler
full on middle and leg, driven on the up towards long-on
full outside off, dropped off the front foot towards short cover
short on middle, forced off the back foot but straight to midwicket
back of a length on middle, pushed to cover, there's an overthrow from Anderson and they come back for the second
fullish on middle and leg, defended watchfully off the back foot to the bowler
good length on the off stump, defended cautiously towards cover
pushed off the front foot in the direction of cover, the runs have dried up here
full on middle and off, flicked away to midwicket

spoils what was otherwise an excellent over, full toss outside off, Bravo latches onto it, driving it uppishly over cover for a much-needed boundary. They'll need a few more of those, and in fairly quick time
good length on the off stump, hit across the line but along the ground to long-on
goes for a blazing drive through the off side, misses, not quite to the pitch there
fullish on the off stump, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket as he tries to drive that past the bowler
full on middle and leg, hit through the line to long-on
slightly short on leg stump, punched down the ground to long-on
on middle and leg, fails to beat the midwicket fielder, the run-rate has crept up to well above eight
good length on middle and leg, pushed back past the bowler for a single
flies off the outside edge as he makes room to cut that past point, takes his top-hand off, third man runs across and cuts it off
back of a length on middle, pushed off the back foot to long-on
full on middle and leg, driven on the up towards long-on, they need more than just this
Pollard strikes a timely six, overpitched on middle, got under it nicely, lofting it cleanly over Pietersen at long-on
short on middle, goes for the pull, gets the top-edge that just manages to clear Harmison at short fine, two more
good length on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
held it back, bowled slightly short, turned wide of midwicket for a single
came back in a touch, a tight line on middle played towards Strauss at midwicket
fullish on middle, gets back, closes the face and plays it wide of midwicket for a single
came back in and struck him high on the pads as he tried to work it into the leg side, would have probably gone over the stumps
short of a length, cut away wide of third man, brings up the 100
short of a good length on the off stump, played with an angled bat down to third man for a single
fuller on middle and off, gets back and flicks it away uppishly through the square-leg region
a touch too straight, worked away wide of Flintoff at deep midwicket, but he;s got a powerful arm and they;re taking no chances on the second
short of a good length on the off, dropped between point and cover for a well-run single
full on the off stump, driven through the line wide of Anderson for a single to long-off
an attempted pull gone wrong but lands safely, well short of long-on, was aiming at deep midwicket there but ended up slicing it

close shout for lbw, bowled from wide of the crease, angling into the right hander, lands short of a good length on middle and leg, Bravo gets back to whip it off his pads, misses and is struck in line. Replays indicate it would have clipped the bails
on middle and off, pushed off the back foot into the leg side
struck on the pads again but this was going down
good length on the off stump, pushed wide of cover and he sets off
full on middle and leg, turned away towards deep square leg
uses his wrists to work it towards Mascarenhas at short fine
excellent take by Prior who dived full length to his left , full outside off, goes for a booming drive but misses, bowled quick and also managed to get some inswing
yorker length on the off stump, dug out towards long-off, a single is all they can manage
shot! Length ball on the off stump, Bravo makes room and chips it over mid-off, clears him comfortably and rolls over the boundary. That will relieve some pressure
struck firmly but straight to Bell at cover who's right at the edge of the circle
attempted yorker on leg stump, pushed wide of a diving Flintoff towards long-off
bludgeoned back past the bowler, almost took Bravo out who fell as he tried to evade that, but there;'s a long-on in place and despite that show of strength, a single is all he'll get
well bowled, slower ball bowled short outside off, takes forever to reach Pollard who fails to pick it, important dot ball that
short again, bowled at normal pace and Pollard takes full toll, making room and carting that over the deep-cover boundary

appeal for run out, played back to towards the bowler who kicks the ball onto the stumps as the batsman tries to make his way back in, twists his ankle as he tries to reach the crease and is in some pain

slower ball bowled short outside off, looks to dismiss that over the deep midwicket boundary, misses, is into the shot too early and Prior fails to collect it on the bounce to effect a run-out as they try to scamper a bye
short of a length on middle and off, gets some good bounce as Bravo tries to cut that over point and misses
an uphill task ahead of West Indies now, Bravo goes after a handy contribution, but should have stayed till the end. Slower one again, short outside off, mistimes a cut straight to Flintoff at cover

not anymore! It's England's match to lose from here on. Full on middle and leg, struck through the line but not well enough, straight to Collingwood at long-on who takes a well judged catch running to his left
pushed off the back foot into the off side for a single
short on the off stump, punched wide of cover
good length outside off, steered to point where Bopara prevents the single
short and wide, goes for the cut, misses, the game's drifting away from the hosts
on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg for a single
short again, bowled at 84.1 mph, beats Ramdin as he tries to play the cut
slower ball bowled short on middle, slapped back past the bowler towards long-on
short on leg stump, plays a short-arm pull down the ground to long-on
short and wide, makes room and cuts that  uppishly towards deep cover
the short-arm pull again, struck back past Ramdin for a single
long hop on middle, Ramdin gets back and pulls it away between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a boundary, but has it come too late?
yorker, excellent stuff, on middle stump, Sammy somehow manages to make contact as he tries to heave it over midwicket, his the bottom of the bat and rolls wide of cover
edged and four, tried to cut that over point but he'll take it,, flew off the outside edge and third man had no chance

bowled'im! Full and straight on the off stump, swinging in, Ramdin shuffles to tickle that fine, he's moved across a little too much and ends up playing the ball onto the stumps, Flintoff's taken three and England are inching towards a series win

Flintoff on a hat-trick! Full on middle and leg, tries to whip it off his pads, misses and is struck on the pads in line with the stumps, Flintoff was late to appeal but Prior was convinced, and so was the umpire

timber! He's taken three in a row and what's more it's a five-for! Yorker on middle, Benn makes room but it's too quick and he fails to get his bat down in time, the stumps take a beating and Flintoff is mobbed
Nope, an inswinging yorker, but dealt with well, pushed into the off side wide of cover
in the block hole but dug out well by Sammy, falls over as he dabs it into the off side
length ball on the off stump, chipped towards long-off
full toss outside off, slashes hard, gets the outside edge towards third man
takes the bottom edge on the way to the keeper and the umpire calls it a wide
full on the off stump, a low full toss, driven to long-off
short of a length on middle, swatted back past Anderson for a run

run out, drilled down the ground towards long-off, calls for the second even though there isn't one, Pietersen rockets in an accurate throw at the striker's end, Prior takes off the bails to find Sammy well short
